title: Bluetooth Technology
content: - Bluetooth is a wireless communication technology that allows devices to connect and exchange data over short distances.
It uses radio waves to transmit data between devices.
Bluetooth is widely used in various applications, including wireless headsets, speakers, smartwatches, and car infotainment systems.
image_desc: A stylized illustration of two smartphones connected by a blue Bluetooth symbol.
narration: Bluetooth is a wireless technology that lets devices talk to each other without wires. It uses radio waves to send information between things like headphones, speakers, and even your car. It's a super handy way to connect and share data over short distances.
